page.title: 20Muslim Festivals - 'Eid'
page.content: When my family came back from Pakistan we moved to Milnsbridge. One of the Muslim Festivals we celebrate is Little Eid. On 19th June, 1985 it was Little Eid.I woke up at 6.00am., had a bath and got changed. I wore a white dress with a red and white jacket; red and white sandals and red bracelets. I went downstairs to help my mum cook the food for the feast. We made kebabs, samosas, rice, yogurt and fizzy pop. The men and boys ate first when they had returned from the mosque. The girls played out while the ladies talked.Then it was the ladies and girls' turn to eat while the men relaxed. My mum gave me Â£5, my dad gave me Â£2 and my auntie gave me Â£3. I bought my brother a dart game. My friend gave me an Eid Mubarak card.
